title: Minecraft Java版 1.13-pre7 发布
author: LocusAzzurro
txt_content:
预发布版是Minecraft的测试机制，如果该版本作为正式版发布，那么预发布版的游戏文件将与启动器推送的正式版完全相同。
然而，预发布版主要用于服主和Mod制作者的预先体验，如果发现致命漏洞，该预发布版会被新的预发布版代替。因此对于普通玩家建议持观望态度。
Minecraft 1.13 仍未发布，1.13-pre7为其第49个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。





MINECRAFT 1.13 PRE-RELEASE 7
Minecraft: Java Edition - Update Aquatic Pre-Release

Minecraft 1.13 第七预发布版
Minecraft Java版 水域更新 预发布版

更新内容列表
Fixed outstanding issues with the new improved fonts修复了新优化的字体造成的较突出的问题Maps changed slightly. Read more about it by clicking here.地图进行了少量修改。在这里可以了解详情Made all waterlogged blocks display the drip animation更多的浸水方块会显示滴水动画了More bugfixes!更多漏洞修复！


漏洞修复列表
MC-37557 - Sometimes a minecart sound plays/subtitle shown when loading a worldMC-37557 - 加载世界时有时会播放矿车音效/显示矿车音效字幕MC-122596 - Command autocomplete overrides command history navigationMC-122596 - 指令自动补全会覆盖指令历史浏览操作MC-122734 - No particles when bed explodes in the netherMC-122734 - 床在下界爆炸时不显示粒子效果MC-123087 - Fences, glass panes, iron bars, stairs, and melon/pumpkin stems in structures generate with wrong block stateMC-123087 - 结构中的栅栏、玻璃板、铁栅栏、楼梯和西瓜/南瓜藤在生成时带有错误的方块状态MC-123369 - Trying to recreate world from future version shows no warning and can crashMC-123369 - 尝试重建未来版本的世界时不会显示警告，并有可能引起崩溃MC-123769 - Some item tooltips that previously had colors don't have colors anymoreMC-123769 - 一些曾经有颜色的物品信息条目不再带颜色了MC-123836 - Double blocks aren't loaded in structuresMC-123836 - 结构中未加载占据两格的方块MC-123850 - Redstone dust doesn't update shape of connecting redstone dust when going up onto transparent blocksMC-123850 - 红石线连接到透明方块上的红石线时不更新连接形状MC-124015 - Red Giant Mushrooms generate with 5 blocks having wrong blockstates, thus showing wrong facesMC-124015 - 红色巨型蘑菇生成时带有5个方块状态错误的方块，因此会显示错误的面MC-124126 - You no longer look at the block you are inside ofMC-124126 - 玩家不会再看向覆盖自己的方块MC-124915 - /locate and eye of ender find strongholds in invalid placesMC-124915 - /locate指令和末影之眼会在无效位置找到要塞MC-125090 - Cartographer doesn't unlock woodland mansion map tradesMC-125090 - 制图师村民不会解锁林地府邸地图交易项目MC-125462 - Waterlogged blocks does not decrease light levelMC-125462 - 浸水的方块不会降低光照等级MC-125872 - Superflat preset "The Void" doesn't generate starting platform anymoreMC-125872 - “虚空”超平坦预设不再生成起始平台了MC-125992 - Cave outlines generate in ocean ravinesMC-125992 - 洞穴结构轮廓方块会在海底峡谷中生成MC-126704 - X-ray visionMC-126704 - 方块透视（游泳时上方有半砖时按下shift可透视方块）MC-126998 - When their block state changes, waterlogged blocks don't remove water they let throughMC-126998 - 浸水的方块在它们的方块状态改变时不会移除从它们中流过的水MC-127025 - Waterlogged blocks do not display water drip animationMC-127025 - 浸水的方块不会显示滴水动画MC-127093 - Water flowing onto waterlogged blocks spreads outward, rather than stoppingMC-127093 - 流向浸水方块的水会向外蔓延不会停止流动MC-127114 - Water in glass panes and ladders doesn't appear in mapsMC-127114 - 玻璃板和梯子里的水在地图上不会显示MC-127115 - Visually fully submerged waterlogged blocks don't appear as water on mapsMC-127115 - 看起来完全被水淹没的浸水方块在地图上不会显示为水MC-127224 - Waterlogged blocks that are not full blocks trigger auto-jump even if it is disabled.MC-127224 - 非完整方块的浸水方块会触发自动跳跃，即使已经关闭了这个功能MC-127303 - There are no water sources near the south ceiling of flooded caves and trenchesMC-127303 - 被淹没的海沟和洞穴的南部顶部没有水源方块MC-128257 - Bugged swimming animation while the head is not underwaterMC-128257 - 玩家头部不在水下时会显示错误的游泳动画MC-128478 - Distance swum statistic uses old "swimming" (bobbing on top of water) instead of the new swimmingMC-128478 - 游泳距离统计项目使用了旧版的"swimming"数值（在水面上下摆动的游泳距离），并不统计新版的游泳操作MC-129388 - Player suffocating when touching a solid block while swimmingMC-129388 - 玩家游泳时触碰到固体方块会受到窒息伤害MC-129892 - Selector wildcard doesn't work in scoreboard operationsMC-129892 - 选择器通配符不能在记分板运算(operation)中使用MC-130072 - Pufferfish don't play the entity.puffer_fish.sting sound when damaging mobsMC-130072 - 河豚在对生物造成伤害时不会播放entity.puffer和fish.sting音效MC-131352 - Item rarity color / colour overrides first text component's colour in the held tooltip (item switching)MC-131352 - 物品稀有度颜色会覆盖快捷栏中物品名文本（切换物品时显示）中第一段文本结构的颜色MC-131382 - Scoreboard objective name can't be updatedMC-131382 - 记分板记分项名称不可被更新MC-132135 - Bad performance of a 1.12.2 world in 1.13MC-132135 - 1.12.2版本世界在1.13中运行性能较差MC-132248 - Server crash on launch using Java 9 or newerMC-132248 - 服务器使用Java 9或更新版本时启动时崩溃MC-132269 - Blocks invisible on mapMC-132269 - 某些方块在地图上不可见MC-132375 - Upgrading 1.12.2 world to 1.13-pre5 crashes the gameMC-132375 - 将1.12.2版本世界升级至1.13-pre5时会引发游戏崩溃MC-132631 - Cannot write in the box in the Superflat presets optionMC-132631 - 超平坦预设设置中不能在方框内写入文字MC-132632 - Can not climb 1 block height if player is in water 5 or more blocks from water sourceMC-132632 - 玩家在距离水源5格以外的水中不能爬上一格高的方块MC-132654 - F3 + I is missing large amounts of dataMC-132654 - F3+I界面缺失大量数据MC-132706 - Sticky pistons pull blocks that pop offMC-132706 - 粘性活塞会拉取会掉落的方块，导致其掉落MC-132751 - Two chests spawned inside each otherMC-132751 - 两个箱子生成在同一位置MC-132833 - Opening 1.5.2 world on 1.12.2 works perfectly but bed is transparent.MC-132833 - 在1.12.2版本中打开1.5.2版本世界时可以正常运作，但床是透明的。MC-132974 - Converting 1.12 world to 1.13 spams Chunk file at x,y is missing level data, skippingMC-132974 - 将1.12版本世界转换为1.13版本时会大量提示"Chunk file at x,y is missing level data, skipping"（x,y位置区块文件丢失，已跳过）MC-132977 - Esc key results in an older world being converted to a newer version during 'Play' menu sequenceMC-132977 - 在开始游戏操作流程中（是否转换旧版本地图为新版本界面）按下Esc键会导致地图被转换为新版本MC-133063 - When trying to connect to an unreachable server Minecraft crashes instead of showing error messageMC-133063 - 当尝试连接到一个无法访问的服务器时，Minecraft会崩溃而不是显示错误信息MC-133136 - Crash when launching the game with LWJGL allocation debugging enabledMC-133136 - 开启LWJGL分配调试模式时启动游戏会导致崩溃MC-133139 - The image write callback is never freed, leaking small amounts of memory for each screenshotMC-133139 - 图片写入回调操作未进行释放，每次截图都会导致少量内存泄露MC-133140 - The GL debug message callbacks are never freed, causing memory leak warningsMC-133140 - GL调试消息回调操作未进行释放，会引发内存泄漏警告



跨平台服务器Jar文件下载：
https://launcher.mojang.com/mc/game/1.13-pre7/server/6cd8348fadedaa1de5851f449b995c835bb569eb/server.jar



正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.jar
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 Minecraft  1.13（水域更新）特性列表 的更新。
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。但由于亚马逊服务器https连接在国内时常不稳定，官方启动器下载游戏可能需要魔法上网。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Version history页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
